document.docAuthor: Xu, Ye, Wang, Yu-Ru, Lu, Si-Han, Dietrich, Christopher H. & Qin, Dao-Zheng
document.masterDocTitle: Rubiparvus bistigma, a new genus and species of Empoascini (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae), with a checklist of the Alebroides group in Chinese fauna
